content:
FormularyUpdates-Feb082021.pptx
For those of you interested in the status of potential updates to the Formulary IG, I've attached the PPT we reviewed with the PharmaWG yesterday.
All of the issues (except how the IG should behave when the member is authenticated) have open Jira trackers (referenced in the attached).
We would welcome feedback on the content of the PPT and/or the Jira trackers.

No decisions have been made regarding how to proceed. Some of the issues can be addressed within an STU Update, and others will require an STU2.
@Courtney Bland @Dale Brown @David Clowers @Jason Teeple @Mark Neumuth @Chetana Nayyar @Shamil @Dave Hill
